file_content.text: The truth must come out. I cannot hide what I've done.
I will serve the Republic as you command. I have much to atone for.
Perhaps the Jedi and Sith are not as different as I believed. I will meditate on this.
The Emperor's Wrath is gone. He isn't coming back for you.
You saved this base. And me. I should be grateful.
It felt good, protecting the base. For a moment, I forgot what I'd done.
I had no doubts about myself during that battle. I felt good. Clean. Free.
Nothing makes sense anymore. I don't know what to do.
Republic reinforcements are coming. Once they arrive, you will turn yourself in to the Jedi Council. They can help you.
Return to Tython.
I've brought shame to Master Braga. He had such hopes for me.
He sent me because he cares about you. What you've done here won't change that.
He'll forgive you.
All this time living among Jedi, and I've learned nothing of forgiveness.
Failure is an opportunity to make things right. Commit yourself to redemption.
Consider this a second chance.
I don't know if I can walk that path, but I'll try.
Maybe you can't change who you are. Maybe you'll always be Sith.
You're just not a Jedi.
How could Master Braga have been so wrong?
I will confess everything to the Council and let them decide my fate. May the Force be with you.
I didn't see you killing those Imperial prisoners. For all I know, they were trying to escape.
Forget this ever happened.
The Republic needs every Jedi it can get. Put this behind you and help us win this war.
I don't want to bring shame to Master Braga. If you think it's better to stay silent, I will.
But I'll have to find another way to serve. The more I fight, the more I risk becoming our enemy.
We'll need victory on many fronts. Help where you can and leave the fighting to others.
Seek your own path.
Your wisdom is great. I see why my Master sent you.
A Jedi enters battle free of emotions. It doesn't come easily, but you have to learn.
You must find balance.
I spent decades trying to channel my hatred in battle. How can I unlearn that?
The fate of the galaxy rests on our ability to confront the Empire's evil head-on. You can't back down.
Take that risk.
I'll do what I can, but if I fall to the dark side... I'll have to be destroyed.
What happened here remains between us. Tell Master Braga my silence was a ruse to trap the enemy.
I will meditate on the path ahead. May the Force be with you.
I have killed dozens--maybe hundreds--of Imperials. Am I evil? No.
Keep on destroying the enemy.
To win, we must kill the enemy before they kill us. Master Braga doesn't understand that, but I do.
If you can be what's necessary--a weapon to destroy all who threaten the Republic--then you'll be a hero.
Funny, I always thought being a hero would sound... heroic.
You should run for the Senate. You'd fit right in.
Those words are truth. This Jedi is a great warrior.
Being a hero > killing enemy // Hero = defend life
You're asking me to do exactly what the Empire commanded--defend its civilization at all costs.
I'm not asking you to slaughter innocent civilians--but anyone in a uniform is fair game.
Within reason.
My Master sent you to me, but you're so different from him.
You left the Empire because it's evil. Do you still believe that?
Your loyalty is to us.
I do--but the Jedi path... it's more complicated than my Master told me.
The people you came from are a plague that needs eradicating. You can't save them.
The Empire isn't civilization.
My Master said I could be saved. Am I the only one?
Master Braga says one thing and you say the opposite... but I feel the truth of your words.
I'll meditate on your guidance. Please tell my Master I'm alright. May the Force be with you.
The enemy is coming. You must stop them without me.
I will aid the engineers. Perhaps there is still hope of stopping the enemy.
If I must fight and die, so be it. Lead on.
My Master sent you, didn't he? Of course. My shame is complete.
This war... I wasn't ready. I never should've left Tython.
I'm here to help. Tell me what's wrong.
It's going to be alright.
Put your fears behind you. We need to defend this base.
Hiding isn't the answer.
I can't go out there. You don't know what I'm capable of.
You left this base nearly defenseless. These people need a Jedi, not a coward.
Obviously not.
I'm not a coward. Not a Jedi, either.
When the Empire first invaded, the soldiers here captured some Imperial scouts. Brought them to me for interrogation. The prisoners... angered me.
I killed them. Lied about what happened. When Imperial forces arrived outside, I hurled the corpses at them. Revealed my true face.
You're afraid to fight because you can't control your emotions.
So that's why you retreated.
I've lost my balance. Fallen back to the old ways. Failed as a Jedi.
Master Braga told me about your past. He said you embraced the light side.
The dark side.
I thought I'd changed. I want to. But... this war....
This is war. They're the enemy. It's our job to kill them.
You did nothing wrong.
The scouts were shackled. Defenseless. I didn't execute them--I slaughtered them.
The only reason I stayed is because an Imperial officer recognized me. Called me by my old name. Said the "Emperor's Wrath" is coming.
He's sending his personal executioner for me. His wrath incarnate. I'll be punished for my crimes.
Who is the Emperor's Wrath? A Sith Lord?
Tell me about this killer.
A ghost. Older than anyone except the Emperor himself. Even the Dark Council fears him.
You stayed here for that--to be executed.
You want to die.
I'll never atone for all I've done, no matter how long I live.
But you're condemning the brave Republic men and women here, too.
Along with everyone else.
I can't save them and they won't retreat. What can I do?
Fighting would accelerate my return to the dark side. I'd rather die with Jedi teachings in my heart.
I'm no counselor, but this guy's a few banthas short of a herd. He's not gonna be much help.
The last thing we need is him going dark side in here. We'll have to save this base without him.
Selfish. A good soldier fights regardless of the personal cost.
Jedi + T7 = defend this base // Sajar = perform another function?
Lieutenant Gundo, Eighty-sixth Infantry. You're here just in time. We've got Imperial forces massing outside.
My engineers jury-rigged some ray shields, but it'll take time to seal the base. Unless you people hold the main entrance, we're dead.
Please, you don't know what you're asking me to do. I can't fight them.
Whatever crimes you've committed, the Sith won't be punishing you for them. Stay hidden.
Then remain here.
I don't deserve such mercy.
I'll deal with our attackers. You get those ray shields online.
Help the engineers instead.
But I... yes. I'll do everything I can.
You made this mess. You'll help clean it up. Arm yourself--move!
You can and you will!
Falling in defense of others would be a good death....
We're out of time--Imperials are coming through! Defend the main entrance!
